channel.title: FREE MONEY AND BEER AND AWESOME THINGS..... Utorrent Portforward help
channel.description:
What order do you open them in?..
is it your run in your source file - No-IP - utorrent and then click the smilyface in the no-ip? because i cant get it to work for some reason.
any help is much appreciated.

item.title: FREE MONEY AND BEER AND AWESOME THINGS..... Utorrent Portforward help
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

[quote=“Czar y2k, post:9, topic:324937”][quote author=Lewis) link=topic=421295.msg3094096#msg3094096 date=1263137854]

no here is how do portforward with utorrent:
1.Open no-ip(don’t do anything to it yet)
2.run your server
3.open utorrent
4.press ctrl and p
5.click connections(if not already selected)
6.type in 43594
7. click apply then ok
8.do #4 again
9.instead of typing click randomize port then click apply then ok
10.cancel down utorrent from the system tray(the thing with your internet symbol and volume)

if ya need some pics to explain this ask and i will post them

Thanks but that didn’t make my server online, and do i leave the NO-IP with none of the faces blushed?
[/quote]
u need the faces bushed, there should be a check mark in the box next t the faces.[/quote]

I really don’t know what to do then, i have done everything you two said & i still cant get my server online, I have tried alot of things to actually portforward - but i had no luck and since it worked on my vista computer (untill i upgraded to win7) i was sure it would work on my win7 but i guess not, if anyone has any other suggestions can you say, I can’t afford the hosting people offer and i want to host myself but how else can I host? Or maybe go more into detail with the Utorrent way

Thanks for all the replys though, i really appreciate it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

Czar y2k:

open no-ip and keep it open, just minimize it. The same fo utorrent, open, portforward, then minimize. then run your server.

What about making the face on the NO-IP blush when do i do that?

  • you cant open your server after utorrent is open.
